body:
#### PR description:

This converts a out-of-bounds read error leading to a segmentation fault seen in RelVals into an assertion failure which isolates the exact code causing the problem.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. Running workflow 34034.0 now triggers an assertion failure rather than a segmentation fault.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1414
title: Added asserts to HGCal RecHit production code
